input_text:
Job Title: Facilities Maintenance

Location: Williamsport, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Overview

 Job Title: Facilities Maintenance 

 Job Location: Williamsport, PA 

Under limited supervision, perform/assist in construction, maintenance and repair of plant facilities, grounds and equipment. Perform duties that require a skilled level of proficiency in at least one of the maintenance skill sets and a basis for knowledge in other skill sets. Work in a team environment assisting others outside of your skill set to complete tasks.

Responsibilities

 Judgment and initiative will be required in selecting proper work method. Typical examples: diagnosing electrical circuit failures, repairing fixtures, determining cause of mechanical failures, repairing or modifying plumbing.  Have basic knowledge of code requirement for skill in which most proficient.  Know and perform procedures required in handling an emergency plant shutdown situation.  Read and understand blueprints. Work may also involve occasional use of shop mathematics.  Perform other related duties as assigned.  Maintain work area in clean and orderly manner.  Perform work as required in order to conform to acceptable standards of quality.  Follow all security and safety instructions. 

Qualifications

 Approximately 2 to 3 years of working experience in the field of building maintenance construction, or equipment repair and proficiency in any one of the following: plumbing, electrical work, carpentry, mechanics, etc.  Or minimum of two years as Plant Maintenance C with proficiency in one of the areas mentioned.  Ability to read blueprints. 

Stellant Systems is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. We consider applicants without regard to race, color, religion, age, national origin, ancestry, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status, disability, genetic information, citizenship status or membership in any other group protected by federal, state or local law.

To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, applicant must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by ITAR (22 CFR

120.15).

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

job_responsibilities: Conforming to acceptable standards of quality
Maintaining work area in clean and orderly manner
